languages.text: "Потому что ее деяния идут против всего, во что ты веришь. На самом деле веришь. Искупление, милосердие, раскаянье — им нет места в мире Инцендии. Хочешь ли ты и правда лицезреть такой же мир?"

"Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"
languages.original_text: "Потому что ее деяния идут против всего, во что ты веришь. На самом деле веришь. Искупление, милосердие, раскаянье — им нет места в мире Инцендии. Хочешь ли ты и правда лицезреть такой же мир?"

traits.locale_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption or mercy or penitence. Would the sight of such a world really please your eyes?"

"Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption or mercy or penitence. Would the sight of such a world really please your eyes?"

"Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption or mercy or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

"Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

"Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

languages.text: “因为她的行为与你的信仰背道而驰，与你真正的信仰格格不入。因森蒂娅的世界中没有救赎、没有仁慈，也没有忏悔，这样的世界真的能让你感到满意吗？”
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: “因为她的行为与你的信仰背道而驰，与你真正的信仰格格不入。因森蒂娅的世界中没有救赎、没有仁慈，也没有忏悔，这样的世界真的能让你感到满意吗？”

languages.text: 「彼女の行動が、信じている全てに反しているからだ。お前が心から信じている事に。インセンディアの世界には、贖罪や慈悲、懺悔の居場所はない。お前はそんな世界を目の当たりにしつづけたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の行動が、信じている全てに反しているからだ。お前が心から信じている事に。インセンディアの世界には、贖罪や慈悲、懺悔の居場所はない。お前はそんな世界を目の当たりにしつづけたいのか？」

languages.text: «Porque sus acciones van en contra de todo en lo que cree. En lo que de verdad cree. En el mundo de Incendia no cabe la redención, la piedad o la penitencia. ¿Acaso la visión de un mundo así le complacería?».
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: «Porque sus acciones van en contra de todo en lo que cree. En lo que de verdad cree. En el mundo de Incendia no cabe la redención, la piedad o la penitencia. ¿Acaso la visión de un mundo así le complacería?».

languages.text: "Weil Ihr Verhalten allem widerspricht, woran Ihr glaubt. Woran Ihr wirklich glaubt. In Incendias Welt ist kein Platz für Erlösung oder Gnade oder Buße. Würde der Anblick einer solchen Welt Eure Augen erfreuen?"
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr Verhalten allem widerspricht, woran Ihr glaubt. Woran Ihr wirklich glaubt. In Incendias Welt ist kein Platz für Erlösung oder Gnade oder Buße. Würde der Anblick einer solchen Welt Eure Augen erfreuen?"

languages.text: « Parce que ses actes vont à l'encontre de tout ce en quoi vous croyez au plus profond de vous. Dans le monde d'Incendia, la rédemption, la miséricorde et la pénitence n'ont pas leur place. Est-ce vraiment ce que vous souhaitez ? »
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que ses actes vont à l'encontre de tout ce en quoi vous croyez au plus profond de vous. Dans le monde d'Incendia, la rédemption, la miséricorde et la pénitence n'ont pas leur place. Est-ce vraiment ce que vous souhaitez ? »

languages.text: "Çünkü eylemleri, inandığın her şeye ters düşüyor. Gerçekten inandığın her şeye. İncendia'nın dünyasında affa, merhamete veya tövbekârlığa yer yok. Dünyanın böyle bir yere döndüğünü görmek seni hoşnut eder mi?"
languages.original_text: "Because her actions fly in the face of all that you believe in. That you truly believe in. Incendia's world has no place for redemption, or mercy, or penitence. Would the sight of such a world please your eyes?"

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü eylemleri, inandığın her şeye ters düşüyor. Gerçekten inandığın her şeye. İncendia'nın dünyasında affa veya merhamete veya tövbekârlığa yer yok. Gözlerin, gördükleri bu dünyadan hoşnut mu?"
